acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased from Jerry N. Showalter, Bookseller on 1996 May 9.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This poem, "Sonnet," by Anne Charlotte Lynch, was apparently copied out for an admirer. On the verso is the inscription " W[illia]mH. Morrell, New York. 1856."
